title: Bug 43914HTTP spec violation when generating HTTP redirects for folders without trailing slash
description: Bug 43914HTTP spec violation when generating HTTP redirects for folders without trailing slash
OB: It has raw unencoded spaces in the URL which isin clear violation of the HTTP specification.
SR: Copy the attached static.war into $CATALINAHOME/webapps. Then start the serverand paste this HTTP request in netcat:GET /static/name%20with%20spaces HTTP/1.1UserAgent: Jakarta CommonsHttpClient/3.0Host: localhost:8080Tomcat will answer with the following HTTP redirect:HTTP/1.1 302 Moved TemporarilyServer: ApacheCoyote/1.1Location: http://localhost:8080/static/name with spaces/TransferEncoding: chunkedDate: Tue, 20 Nov 2007 13:46:12 GMTObserve the Location: header.
